full_title: We Good by Lil Uzi Vert
title: We Good

description.plain:
“We Good” serves as the opening track on Lil Uzi Vert’s fourth studio album, Eternal Atake 2.

In this track, Uzi reveals that they’ve been using nitrous oxide, a gas with significant health risks when used recreationally. Despite this, Uzi reassures fans that everything is fine.

On October 27, 2024, just five days before the album dropped, an early version of the Eternal Atake 2 tracklist surfaced on Uzi’s Instagram story, listing the intro as “I’m Cooked (Skit) (ft. BlingBling).” However, just seven hours before release, Uzi posted the final tracklist, unveiling the intro’s official title as We Good.

embed_content: Read “We Good” by Lil Uzi Vert on Genius
recording_location: Jungle City Studios, Manhattan, New York City, NY.

album.full_title: Eternal Atake 2 by Lil Uzi Vert
album.name: Eternal Atake 2
